Job Description: Job Description     We are looking for someone who is an Expert in Python language, Frappe, and ERPNext app framework.    Ability to create database schemas that represent and support business processes.    Strong unit-testing and debugging skills.    Adequate experience with related programming languages.    Good knowledge of MYSQL Database (schema manipulation, stored procedures, debugging, permissions).    Development of server-side, API's, client-side logic.    Write efficient and reusable code Design and implement low-latency and high-availability applications on ERPNext and Frappe framework.    Integration of client-side interface with server-side logic Skills.    Documentation creation and following.
